title: Can a woman recite loudly in loud & silent prayers? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: is it permissible for a woman to recite loudly inside and outside the prayer if there is no Muharram if there is no nun muharram around her this is permissible reciting loudly in silent prayers is against the Sunnah but it is permissible so if I decide to recite loudly in surah in in solitude war and acid my prayer is valid but I'm leaving a Sunnah and if I do the opposite so when I come to fetcher I recite silently my prayer is still valid
